short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to manage and organize your workspaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MyWorkBench - Browser Tab Management Made Simple

MyWorkBench is a powerful browser extension that helps you organize and manage your browser workspaces efficiently. Create custom workbenches to instantly launch multiple websites in your preferred configuration.

Key Features:
• Create and save custom workspaces with multiple URLs
• Choose how workbenches open: new window, current window, or ask each time
• Pin important tabs automatically
• Import all tabs from your current window into a new workbench
• Quick access to commonly used websites across different categories
• Drag-and-drop interface for easy organization
• Merge workbenches with simple drag-and-drop
• Custom URL management with categorization
• Clean, intuitive interface with modern design

Perfect for:
• Developers managing multiple documentation and tool websites
• Professionals switching between different work contexts
• Students organizing research and study resources
• Anyone who frequently works with multiple websites simultaneously

MyWorkBench helps you eliminate tab clutter and instantly access the websites you need, exactly how you want them arranged.
